title: Ketu Transit in the 12th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your twelfth house intensifies detachment from the material world, outcomes, and visible control over life. The need for isolation, rest, or withdrawal increases as inner awareness deepens. Expenses may rise on spiritual, healing, or non-material matters, while worldly ambition fades. This phase dissolves subconscious fears and old karmic residue. When embraced consciously, Ketu here supports deep inner cleansing, spiritual surrender, and liberation from hidden anxieties.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong pull toward solitude and introspection.

sections.heading: Career
points: Low interest in visibility or recognition.
Behind-the-scenes or isolated work suits best.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses rise on healing or spiritual needs.

closing: Ketu in the 12th house dissolves attachment at its root. When surrender replaces control, true inner freedom emerges.
